name: RESET Bot
description: This game was made using Unreal Engine 4 based on the theme "RESET" provided in the game jam BYOG21.  The plot of the game is - There's a MomBot that produces a tiny robot every time it gets RESET.  The player will play as the tiny robot and switch to a new robot after being reset. By using the old robots as a stepping stone the player can cross the obstacles to reach the level end. The number of times the player can reset the bot is limited.
